email.title: DoCSoc Weekly Digest
email.text:
Hi everyone!
Due to popular demand, we're bringing it back! Another musical.

We have tickets available to Hamilton at a subsidised price of £20 (down from £100!). Be sure to grab yours early, as we have only a limited number available!
Description from the website: Hamilton is the story of America's Founding Father Alexander Hamilton, an immigrant from the West Indies who became George Washington's right-hand man during the Revolutionary War and helped shape the very foundations of the America we know today. The score blends hip-hop, jazz, blues, rap, R&B and Broadway - the story of America then, as told by America now.
Theatre Address: Victoria Palace Theatre, 126 Victoria St, London SW1E 5EA Date & Time: Wednesday 13th November, 19:30.
It is suggested to arrive 30 minutes before in order to pass through security and get to your seats. Groups must be seated no later than 5 minutes prior to show time!
Tickets release Saturday 9th November at 15:00 on Ticket Tailor [here](https://app.tickettailor.com/events/docsoc/1459343/r/mailshot)
